price: 26. Aan Hem behoort alles wat in de hemelen is en wat op aarde is. Allen geven zich aan hem over (vrijwillig of gedwongen).
arabic: وَلَهُۥ مَن فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ وَٱلۡأَرۡضِۖ كُلّٞ لَّهُۥ قَٰنِتُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: walahu man fī al-samāwāti wal-arḍi kullun lahu qānitūna
